plus: + before each word that the result must have
star: * before or after to end or begin accordingly the matched word with
title: Title:
name: Name (now):
legend: ID to assign existing relation, empty to unassign, to create, to edit
search-placeholder: 🔎 Search by title, names, nick, occupation, dates or places...
nonExistentFamily: Non-existent family ID: {value}. Please assign an existing one or create a family first.
nonExistentHusband: Non-existent husband ID: {value}. Please assign an existing one.
nonExistentWife: Non-existent wife ID: {value}. Please assign an existing one.
nonExistentChild: Non-existent child ID: {value}. Please assign an existing one.
clickToBuild: &#9758 click <button id="buildTreeButton">here</button> to start building your tree
clickToExpand: &#9758 click on any person node to expand a tree view
clickToZoom: &#9758 zoom in and zoom out to scale a view
useOptions: &#9758 use options in top bar to find a person or change a view
saveBack: &#9758 finally, save a tree back as a SVG file
